name: It's Bananas (Rollex)
description:
For some reason, I couldn't build it for web/mobile...

This game is still very good and simple so I recommend you give it a try :*)

Your objective is to stack as many bananas without letting them fall, or maybe you wish to make the highest tower possible (there's indeed a limit), your choice really. Have fun !

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right Arrow: Left-Right Movement

Space: Drop Banana
